name: TEST - SOTA 2026 - WF2 Graph RAG V3.3 - CORRECTED

parameters.query:
=SELECT summary, relevance_score, entity_names 
FROM community_summaries 
WHERE entity_names && ARRAY[{{ $('Neo4j Query Builder (Deep Traversal V2)').json.entities.map(e => "'" + e.replace(/'/g, "''") + "'").join(',') }}]::text[]
  AND tenant_id = '{{ $('OTEL Init').json.user_context.tenant_id }}'
ORDER BY relevance_score DESC 
LIMIT 5

parameters.content:
# üîß VARIABLES D'ENVIRONNEMENT (SOTA 2026) - CORRECTED V3.3.1

## CORRECTIONS APPLIQU√âES:
1. ‚úÖ OTEL Init: Fixed duplicate 'const query' declaration
2. ‚úÖ WF3: Cohere Reranker: Fixed triple nested template
3. ‚úÖ Model references updated for OpenRouter format

## LLM APIs
- `OPENROUTER_BASE_URL` - https://openrouter.ai/api/v1/chat/completions
- `LLM_HYDE_MODEL` - google/gemini-2.0-flash-exp

## Databases
- `NEO4J_URL` - Neo4j HTTP API URL
- `PINECONE_URL` - Pinecone query endpoint

## Reranking
- `RERANKER_API_URL` - https://api.cohere.ai/v1/rerank
- `RERANKER_MODEL` - rerank-multilingual-v3.0
